name: Birds Gone Berserk!
description:
Welcome to Birds Gone Berserk!

Inspired by an idea from a friend. You play as a pigeon, actively wandering the streets of Chicago, building up an avian army to take over the world! Also, your name is Bolshie. This is key to the plot.

Controls:
  • Left and Right arrow keys to move (or A and D).
  • Up arrow key to jump (or Space).
  • R to squawk.

The game is currently in development! So far, it's just a basic platformer. Stay tuned for more!
